Sentencas: In order to investigate the effects of the Zn and Sb cosubstitution for Sn on the crystal structure and electrical conductivity of SnP2O7, Sn1-x(Zn2/3Sb1/3)(x)P2O7 compounds were synthesized in this study.
Titulo: Influence of Zn2+ and Sb5+ co-substitution for Sn4+ on crystal structure and electrical conductivity of SnP2O7 electrolyte

Sentencas: The crystal structure refinement results show the solid solution limit of the Sn1-x(Zn2/3Sb1/3)(x)P2O7 compounds to be x = 0.15.
Titulo: Influence of Zn2+ and Sb5+ co-substitution for Sn4+ on crystal structure and electrical conductivity of SnP2O7 electrolyte

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity of the compounds was enhanced depending on the level of the composition x.
Titulo: Influence of Zn2+ and Sb5+ co-substitution for Sn4+ on crystal structure and electrical conductivity of SnP2O7 electrolyte
Influence of Zn2+ and Sb5+ co-substitution for Sn4+ on crystal structure and electrical conductivity of SnP2O7 electrolyte

Sentencas: S cm(-1) was obtained for x = 0.15, at 250 degrees C. It was suggested that the interstitial proton of the Sn1-x(Zn2/3Sb1/3)(x)P2O7 lattice was introduced by the formation of oxygen vacancies that originated from the cosubstitution of Zn and Sb for Sn.
Titulo: Influence of Zn2+ and Sb5+ co-substitution for Sn4+ on crystal structure and electrical conductivity of SnP2O7 electrolyte

Sentencas: It was confirmed that the introduction of the interstitial proton significantly enhanced the electrical conductivity of the Sn1-x(Zn2/3Sb1/3)(x)P2O7 compounds.
Titulo: Influence of Zn2+ and Sb5+ co-substitution for Sn4+ on crystal structure and electrical conductivity of SnP2O7 electrolyte

Sentencas: Thus, the Sn1-x(Zn2/3Sb1/3)(x)P2O7 compounds can be a promising candidate electrolyte with proton conducting at intermediate operating temperatures.
Titulo: Influence of Zn2+ and Sb5+ co-substitution for Sn4+ on crystal structure and electrical conductivity of SnP2O7 electrolyte
